methods.name: closeDialog
methods.description: Closes currently opened dialogs

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: customizeDialog
methods.description: Customizes the user's dialog

params.description:
The type of dialog to customize.  If you set as null, the config will be applied to all dialogs.
Options are: record-create, record-delete, record-info, record-update, view-error, view-info, view-success, view-warn, zg-version
params.name: type

params.description:
Options for the data retrieval.  Options are:
cancel (text for the cancel button), confirm (text for the confirm button),
title: (title to display on the dialog)
params.name: config

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: column
methods.description: Fetches the targeted column.

params.description: Field index of column to fetch.
params.name: fieldIndex

returns.description: Column object.

methods.name: filterColumn
methods.description:
Filters the column specified by column index. Note: `filter` attribute must be present for
this method to work.

params.description: Index of column.
params.name: columnIndex

params.description: Filter string.
params.name: filter

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: filterMenuColumn
methods.description:
Advanced filtering on the column specified by column index. Note: `filter` attribute must be present for
this method to work with the filter menu enabled.

params.description: Field Index of column.
params.name: fieldIndex

params.description: Advanced Filter configuration.
params.name: filter

params.description: Array of conditional objects to filter on
params.name: filter.conditionals

params.description: the key based string for the condition to apply the filter, ie contains, startsWith, greaterThan
params.name: filter.conditionals[].condition

params.description: The first value to apply towards the condition
params.name: filter.conditionals[].val1

params.description: The second value to apply towards the condition
params.name: filter.conditionals[].val2

params.description: 'and' or 'or' indicating how to filter multiple conditionals.  Default is 'and'
params.name: filter.boolean

params.description: Boolean indicating if the matching should be case sensitive.  Default is false
params.name: filter.matchCase

params.description: Array of items to select in the filter menu selectbox
params.name: filter.selectItems

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: getData
methods.description: Fetches the internal property referencing the dataset for the grid
displayValues: { csv: true, headers: true, col: "all or visible", rows: "all or visible" }

params.description:
Optional, options for the data retrieval.  Options are:
csv (set true to return csv string),
headers (set true to return headers - only applies to csv or JSON array of arrays),
cols (set to 'all' or 'visible' to return all or only visible columns),
rows (set to 'all' or 'visible' to return all or only visible rows)
params.name: config

returns.description: The dataset.

methods.name: setLicense
methods.description:
Sets the license and removes watermarks if it is valid.
If the license is not set on page load, it is possible to set it through this API Method

params.description: The license array
params.name: license

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together

methods.name: updateSize
methods.description: Forces a resize event to be triggered and to partially repaint the grid. Useful when the container updates size without the window updating.

params.description: Display the loading screen while updating the grid.  False by default
params.name: showLoading

params.description: The time to delay the action.  This should be > the time it takes to do the CSS transition.  Value in seconds
params.name: delay

returns.description: Returns the component so that you can chain methods together
